//: A generic prisoner entry for anyone stuck in jail.  At some point.

dynamic_line: My god, you've got to get me out of here.  The things... the things they've done... please help.
Aren't you a little short to be a stormtrooper?
Can you get me out of this hell hole?
Who are you?  Are you real?
Can you please save me?  I have to get out of here.
I can't believe my eyes.  Thank you, thank you!
How are you here?  Are you one of them, somehow?  What's going on?

responses.text: Come with me, if you want to live.
I've no use for weaklings.  Run.  Now.
